short_summary: The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is issuing a Request for Proposal for the acquisition of a spectrometer.
description: The spectrometer will be delivered to the Saint-Hyacinthe Research and Development Center in Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada. The procurement method is competitive open bidding. The selection criteria is the lowest price.
duration_in_months: When will the delivery start? (not provided)
